conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. All 3D fundamental criteria are met with high fidelity.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect execution of wall thickness, floor separation, and isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful room adjacency and wall proportions. Some window/door frame details are simplified but correctly placed.

interior_elements.notes: Exceptional furniture placement; sofa, dining table, and bed configurations match the 2D layout precisely.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and consistent materials. No UI or text contamination. Background is clean and focused.

detected_errors.description: Balcony door/window frame geometry is slightly stylized compared to the technical blueprint lines.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that maintains strict geometric fidelity to the original floor plan with high-quality rendering.
